title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration; use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that feels like ChatGPT but runs entirely local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; async, streaming, and embedding support with POJO mappings.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama’s REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces for Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community registry for sharing custom Modelfiles, prompt adapters, and LoRA fine-tunes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and rootless mode.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that caches and serves Ollama models inside ephemeral containers.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to Ollama’s REST and streaming endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library with source generators for strongly-typed chat completions and embeddings.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI autocomplete, summarization, and semantic search via Ollama.
